name: Fidem
description:
Travel on a journey throughout the region of Gaia as Jake Piroski, a teenager, tries to find the truth behind a series of repetitive dreams about an entity known as Deus, who is supposedly a mighty god with mind-bending powers. Evolve through the midst of plenty of battles and delve deep into the mystery behind his dreams. Meet new people, make new friends, explore the world, discover stories and create memories.  The journey won't be easy! 

Fidem was possible by the efforts of not only Ducklings Studios but the existing assets of these people:

Yanfly Engine Plugins

Moghunter

Galv: galvs-scripts.com
